EmailTemplate.subject: PA13-003 - Inform CAD 5.3 General Availability
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Product Announcement PA13-003 – Inform CAD 5.3 General Availability POSTED: 03-12-13
Dear Clients,
The Product Announcement, PA13-003 - Inform CAD 5.3 General Availability <https://na6.salesforce.com/articles/Tech_Advisory/PA13-003-Inform-CAD-5-3-General-Availability?popup=true> has been posted to the Support site.
You may access this advisory via the Salesforce site under Articles or by clicking on the link <https://na6.salesforce.com/articles/Tech_Advisory/PA13-003-Inform-CAD-5-3-General-Availability?popup=true> included on this e-mail.
Sincerely,
Shane Birch Technical Support Supervisor – 911/Inform (VisiNet) | Decorah, IA TriTech Software Systems | www.tritech.com <tritech.com>
Support Website: Salesforce.com <salesforce.com>
